data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Southland, New Zealand that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southland, New Zealand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Southland, New Zealand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Southland to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Southland, New Zealand.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, 1.9% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Southland, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Southland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 16,772 believers in the state of Southland the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
